|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6AA160TSB-5G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 90:A7:C1 |oui = 90:A7:C1
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9283; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :OEM: [[Senao]] (7016A0511001) â€¢ [[EnGenius ECB350]]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Atheros]] AR7242 [[MIPS 24Kc]] @400MHz *Storage: 8MB (SPI NOR) Flash *Memory: 32MB (DDR2) DRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9283 802.11bgn (2.4GHz, 800mW) *Network: 1x GbE ports *Power: 12V/2A via barrel or 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.pakedge.com/media/docs/press-releases/2014-2003/pak-W6-pr.pdf Press Release]
